src:
Barsa pokazuje snagu u Milanu, Realu treba ubedljiva pobeda
Čak sedam mečeva igra se u petak u Evroligi

01 Nov 2019

Kraj prve evroligaške sedmice s duplim programom ostavio je prebogati košarkaški program sa čak sedam utakmica!
Dan prepun dešavanja u elitnom takmičenju otvaraju Zenit i CSKA. Tim iz Sankt Peterburga još nije uspeo da se navikne na žestok ritam najbolje košarke u ovom delu planete, što se jasno oslikava na igračima Đoana Plaze. Aktuelni šampion novo evropsko gostovanje dočekuje posle dva ubedljiva brejka u Valensiji i Berlinu, gde je prosek ubačenih poena na čak 89 po utakmici!
Zenit ove sezone na svom terenu trpi ozbiljan teror jer ima četiri uzastopna poraza. U dve situacije nije uspeo da prebaci ni 70 poena, mada su protivnici bili vrlo jaki – Barselona i Panatinaikos u Evroligi, odnosno Nižnji i Lokomotiva u VTB ligi.
CSKA je poslednjih godina često imao problema sa Zenitom u Sankt Peterburgu. U poslednjoj utakmici polufinala regionalnog takmičenja Armejci su prekinuli niz od tri poraza u gostima Zenitu i to s rezultatom 69:68. Biće ovo prvi evroligaški sudar dva tima, gde očekujemo sigurnu dvojku.
Fenerbahče će na svom terenu pokušati da nađe izlaz iz krize i proba da nadigra Žalgiris Šarunasa Jasikevičijusa koji je ponovo trn u oku najbogatijim evropskim klubovima. Dobra vest za Željka Obradovića je povratak Nikole Kalinića u sastav i očekuje se da će srpski reprezentativac pokrenuti stvari nabolje.
Feneru je ovo tek druga evropska utakmica na domaćem terenu, kao i Žalgirisu na strani. Očekivano, Fener je kod kuće bio bolji od Baskonije u tom meču sa 87:80, dok je litvanski gigant dobro iscedio košarkaše Armanija pre nego što je položio oružje.
Podsetimo, Žalgiris zna kako se pobeđuje u Istanbulu. Prošle sezone je slavio u tesnoj završnici druge utakmice plej-ofa sa 82:80, kada je eksplodirao Edgaras Ulanovas s 20 poena, uz koš za pobedu.
Valensija i Asvel imaju svoju istoriju duela u evropskim takmičenjima. Poslednji put su se na parketu našli prošle sezone u Evrokupu i zanimljivo je da je svaki put dosad domaćin odnosio pobedu. Dosadašnji susreti bili su često prosečno efikasni, s minimumom od 144 poena, ali često je padalo i mnogo više koševa.
Slepi miševi zasad ne pokazuju da imaju evroligaški materijal i još traže put do pobede kod kuće. Asvel je, opet, u dosadašnja dva gostovanja pretrpeo rutinske poraze. Od Bajerna najteži u istoriji takmičenja...
Možda i derbi šestog kola igra se u Milanu, gde će Armani dočekati Barselonu. Kaznena ekspedicija Svetislava Pešića i dalje surovo gazi i zaista ističe jaku kandidaturu da ode do samog kraja i uzme trofej posle ravno deset godina čekanja.
Armani bi trebalo da računa i na oporavljenog Nemanju Nedovića, ali treba biti oprezan. Manekeni jesu dobili Fenerbahče, ali to je tim koji se nalazi u ozbiljnoj krizi. S druge strane, Barselona je mašinerija koja ne spušta nivo u oba polja igre i Armaniju će za pobedu biti potrebno mnogo više od dobre šuterske partije da bi dobio meč. Ne treba, opet, zaboraviti ni da je Barsa ove sezone već doživela dva čudna poraza u gostima od Saragose i Andore...
Susret Olimpijakosa i Makabija u Pireju biće dobra prilika da se crveno-beli još jednom oduže svom bivšem treneru Janisu Sferopulosu za sve što je uradio tokom četiri sezone zajedničke saradnje. Olimpijakos ove sezone igra vrlo čudne utakmice u Evroligi. Posle trijumfa nad Valensijom u Dvorani mira i prijateljstva stigao je iznenađujući poraz od Zenita posle produžetka. Makabi je u dosadašnja dva evropska gostovanja poražen, ali i Himki i Real su morali da potroše poslednji atom snage kako bi uzeli dva boda.
Baskonija i Real ne bi trebalo da imaju mnogo problema s Bajernom, odnosno Albom u špansko-nemačkim okršajima pošto su domaćini dosad vrlo sigurni pred svojom publikom.

EVROLIGA - 6. KOLO

ČetvrtakCrvena zvezda - Himki 90:78/Simanić 18 - Šved 14/
Panatinaikos - Anadolu Efes 86:70/Rajs 18 - Larkin 28/

Petak18.00:  (3,50) Zenit  (16,00)  CSKA (1,35) 18.45:  (1,25) Fenerbahče  (17,00)  Žalgiris (4,40) 19.00:  (1,30) Valensija  (16,00)  Asvel (3,90) 20.00:  (2,15) Olimpija Milano  (14,50)  Barselona (1,80) 20.30:  (1,60) Olimpijakos  (14,50)  Makabi (2,55) 21.00:  (1,30) Baskonija  (16,00)  Bajern (3,90) 21.00:  (1,03) Real Madrid  (28,00)  Alba (12,00) 

NAPOMENA: Kvote su podložne promenama
text:
Barca show strength in Milan, Real needs a convincing win
As many as seven matches will be played in the Euroleague on Friday

01 Nov 2019

The end of the first Euroleague week with a double program left a rich basketball program with as many as seven games!
Zenit and CSKA open the day full of events in elite competition. The St. Petersburg team has not yet managed to get used to the fierce rhythm of the best basketball in this part of the world, which is clearly reflected in the players of Giovanni Plaza. The current European champion is welcomed after two convincing breaks in Valencia and Berlin, with an average of 89 points per game!
Zenit is suffering serious terror on its ground this season as it has four consecutive defeats. In two situations he failed to transfer even 70 points, although the opponents were very strong - Barcelona and Panathinaikos in the Euroleague, and Nizhnyi and Lokomotiv in the VTB league.
CSKA has in recent years often had problems with Zenit in St. Petersburg. In the last game of the semifinals of the regional competition, the Armeis cut off a series of three defeats to Zenit with a score of 69:68. This will be the first Euroleague clash of two teams, where we expect a safe two.
Fenerbahce will try to find a way out of the crisis and try to outplay Zalgiris Sarunas Jasikevicius, who is again a thorn in the eyes of the richest European clubs. The good news for Zeljko Obradovic is the return of Nikola Kalinic to the squad and the Serbian national team is expected to start things better.
Fener this is only the second European match at home as well as Zalgiris on the side. As expected, Fener was better at home than Basque Country in that match with 87:80, while the Lithuanian giant squeezed Armani's basketball players well before laying down.
Zalgiris knows how to win in Istanbul. Last season he celebrated in the tight end of the second game of the game 82-80, when he blasted Edgaras Ulanovas with 20 points, with the basket to win.
Valencia and Aswell have their own history of dueling in European competitions. The last time they were on the floor was last season in Eurocup and it is interesting that every time so far the host claimed a victory. Meetings so far have often been average efficient, with a minimum of 144 points, but often many more points have been dropped.
Bats do not yet appear to have Euroleague material and are still looking for a way to win at home. Aswell, again, has suffered routine defeats in the past two appearances. From Bayern the hardest in competition history ...
Maybe a sixth round derby will be played in Milan, where Armani will welcome Barcelona. The criminal expedition of Svetislav Pesic continues to be cruelly trampled and indeed highlights a strong candidacy to go all the way and take the trophy after a straight ten years of waiting.
Armani should also count on the recovered Nemanja Nedovic, but he should be careful. The mannequins did get Fenerbahce, but this is a team in serious crisis. Barcelona, on the other hand, is a low-level machine in both fields of play and Armani will need much more than a good shooter to win the match. It should not be forgotten again that Barsa have already suffered two strange defeats away from Zaragoza and Andorra this season ...
The Olympiakos and Maccabi meeting in Piraeus will be a good opportunity for the red and white to once again pay tribute to their former coach Janis Sferopoulos for all he has done over four seasons of co-operation. The Olympiak is playing very strange games in the Euroleague this season. After a triumph over Valencia at the Hall of Peace and Friendship, a surprising defeat to Zenit came after the extra time. Maccabi has been defeated in two European appearances so far, but both Khimki and Real have had to spend the last atom of power to take two points.
Basconia and Real should not have much trouble with Bayern and Alba in the Spanish-German clashes as the hosts are very safe in front of their audience so far.

EUROLEAGUE - DAY 6

ThursdayRed Star - Khimki 90: 78 / Simanic 18 - Swede 14 /
Panathinaikos - Anadolu Ephesus 86: 70 / Rice 18 - Larkin 28 /
